aboutinfo.message:
This extension is developed by laobubu and designed to change HTTP request headers.

You can switch user-agent so make websites think you're using another browser! And if you need more, just add.

advancedcd.message: Designed for web developers and debuggers. It provides full features. You can edit the presets and the auto setting rules of each header.

app_des.message: Change the HTTP request header to touch more web views!

condition.message: Condition(s) (This rule will work when it meets all the conditions)

contactmeifintrouble.message: If you get in trouble while using this, you can get help from the help page or contact me.

guider1.message:

Choose a header above to get more options...

guiderd.message: Designed for most users. You can make auto setting rules easily.

haveprofilevalue.message: A profile fires on this page and its auto value is :

log_suggest.message: Since here is a simple logger, I suggest you use Chrome's built-in tool. Click here to try it!

master_msg1.message: The data on a config page won't synchronize automatically with others'.

tips1.message: If this extension does not work on your page, refresh the page with Ctrl+F5
